# The `OffloadArray` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Used to map the values physically (in the IR) stored in an offload array, to a vector in memory. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

  type="bool"
  name={<><a href="#abcd90ebabb4f13fc7c699ed9be36854e">getValues</a> (AllocaInst &amp;Array, Instruction &amp;Before)</>}>
Traverses the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> where <code>Array</code> is, collecting the stores made to <code>Array</code>, leaving StoredValues with the values stored before the instruction <code>Before</code> is reached. <a href="#abcd90ebabb4f13fc7c699ed9be36854e">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

Used to map the values physically (in the IR) stored in an offload array, to a vector in memory.

Definition at line 851 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### initialize() {#aaad44a6bd915587c4aeb48e71abf9c3b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;OpenMPOpt.cpp&#125;::OffloadArray::initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &amp; Array, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; Before)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Initializes the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-openmpopt-cpp-/offloadarray">OffloadArray</a> with the values stored in <code>Array</code> before instruction <code>Before</code> is reached.

Returns false if the initialization fails. This MUST be used immediately after the construction of the object.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp/#l00865">865</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/openmpopt-cpp">OpenMPOpt.cpp</a>.
